text: Ryuji Koizumi (born 17 September 1952) is a Japanese politician. He has been a member of the House of Representatives of Japan since 2000. He was the Minister of Justice from September 2023 to October 2024. == References == Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Tokyo Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians Category:Ministers of justice of Japan
title: Ryuji Koizumi
